Our Vision

To create a greener future by empowering local communities, supporting farmers, and contributing to a sustainable environment through the sale of quality seedlings.

Our Mission

As students, we aim to help local farmers, single parents, and PWD riders by promoting environmentally friendly practices and encouraging tree planting. By selling seedlings, we not only provide for local agriculture but also contribute to climate action and community welfare.

Return Policy

Thank you for choosing Jorbranch! If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you have 7 days to return unused items in their original packaging. After inspection, approved refunds will be processed to your original payment method. You will be responsible for return shipping costs, which are nonrefundable. If you have questions, please contact us at jorbranch@gmail.com.
